summary: Email from attorney Sigrid McCawley forwarding a notification about a motion to stay filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals. McCawley indicates she will respond to the motion the following day.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who received a notification about a motion filed by Maxwell's counsel and plans to respond.

persons.name: Peter Skinner
persons.context: Copied on the email, likely another attorney involved in the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the legal case; her counsel filed a motion to stay in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

connections.description: McCawley is an attorney who will be responding to a motion filed by Maxwell's counsel, indicating she is on the opposing side of the case.

events.title: Motion to Stay Filed
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel filed a motion to stay with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team filed a motion to stay in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on July 30, 2020.
Attorney Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP received notification of the motion and planned to respond by July 31, 2020.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may contain attorney-client privileged information.
